environment.description: If provided, will overlay the starter environment for every seed in this packet

type.description: Pass a prompt to an LLM and get a completion

anyOf.description: The full prompt to be passed to the configured commpletion_model

id.description: An override ID for the seed. If provided must match the name of the seed in the seeds map. Useful for overridng the auto-generated ID for nested seeds.

description.description: An optional description for what a seed does, sometimes shown to users

comment.description: A string that is ignored, useful for internal comments

private.description: If marked as private, then seeds from a different packet won't be able to access this seed.

type.description: Calculate an embedding for the given text

anyOf.description: The full text to be embedded

type.description: Store an embedding in a memory

anyOf.description: Either a pre-computed embedding or text to be converted to a memory
The name of the memory to use. If not provided, defaults to environment.memory

type.description: Retrieve memories similar to this embedding

anyOf.description: Either a pre-computed embedding or text to be used as a query
The number of results to return
The name of the memory to use. If not provided, defaults to environment.memory

type.description: Count the number of tokens in a string

anyOf.description: Either a pre-computed embedding or text to count the tokens in

type.description: Log a value to the console

anyOf.description: The message to echo back

type.description: A no op that simply passes on the provided value

anyOf.description: The value to return

type.description: Calculate and return the then sub-expression if test is true, otherwise calculate and return else

anyOf.description: The value to examine
The value to return if the value of test is truthy
The value to return if the value of test is falsy

type.description: Return whether a == b

anyOf.description: The left hand side to compare
The right hand side to compare

type.description: Return whether a != b

anyOf.description: The left hand side to compare
The right hand side to compare

type.description: Return whether a < b

anyOf.description: The left hand side to compare
The right hand side to compare

type.description: Return whether a > b

anyOf.description: The left hand side to compare
The right hand side to compare

type.description: Return whether a <= b

anyOf.description: The left hand side to compare
The right hand side to compare

type.description: Return whether a >= b

anyOf.description: The left hand side to compare
The right hand side to compare

type.description: Return the opposite of a

anyOf.description: The left hand side to negate

type.description: Return a + b

anyOf.description: The left hand side
The right hand side

type.description: Return a * b

anyOf.description: The left hand side
The right hand side

type.description: Return a / b

anyOf.description: The left hand side
The right hand side

type.description: Render a template, filling in the given parameters

anyOf.description: The template string to replace {{ vars }} in

type.description: Render a template with as many items as fit

anyOf.description: The prefix to the prompt to use
The suffix to the prompt to include
The delimiter between items to use
The list of items to include
The maximum number of tokens to include. If the number is 0 or lower, it will be added to the maximum number of tokens for the current completion_model limit.

type.description: Extract parameters from a run of text according to a template

anyOf.description: The template string to extract {{ vars }} from
The string to match against the template

type.description: Ask the user for an input

anyOf.description: The question to ask the user
The value to use as default if the user doesn't provide anything else
The choices to limit to

type.description: Returns a packed seed reference

anyOf.description: The id of the seed to include in the reference
The location of the packet, can be a relative location

type.description: Dynamically loads the seed at the packed reference location

anyOf.description: The packed ID of the seed to reference
If true, then remote seed fetches will be allowed

type.description: Fetch remote data

anyOf.description: A seed packet absolute location is a local path
A https:// or http:// absolute location
A seed packet location must be a relative path, starting with . or ..
The URL of the resource to fetch
The method (default GET)
The body to pass
The format of the result, default json

type.description: Return the keys of the given object

anyOf.description: The object whose keys to take

type.description: Return the given property from the given object

anyOf.description: The object to select a property from
The property to extract

type.description: Return an object with computed properties
Return an array with computed sub-properties

anyOf.description: Which items to return

type.description: Iterate over each item in an object

anyOf.description: The items to iterate over
The statement to execute for each item

type.description: Return a subset of items that match a filter func

anyOf.description: The items to iterate over
The statement to execute for each item

type.description: Combine two objects or arrays

anyOf.description: The first part
The second part

type.description: Calculate the index of a value within an object

anyOf.description: The thing to search within
The thing to search for
Whether to search from the back to front

type.description: Slice a subset of an array

anyOf.description: The thing to slice
The index to start from
The index to end before (exclusive)

type.description: Split a string into pieces

anyOf.description: The string to split
The delimiter to use

type.description: Join an array of strings into one string

anyOf.description: The array to join
The delimiter to use

type.description: Throw an error

anyOf.description: The message to show

type.description: Retrieve a given variable value

anyOf.description: The name of the variable in environment to fetch
The sub-expression to execute to get a value if value is undefined

type.description: Return a random number

anyOf.description: An optional lower bound, defaults to 0.0
An optional upper bound, defaults to 1.0
The type of rounding to do
If provided, will ignore other parameters and return one item from the array

type.description: Set a random seed for sub-expressions

anyOf.description: The seed to use for random sub-seeds within block
The sub-expressions in which the random seed will be changed

type.description: Set a var to a given value in sub-expressions

anyOf.description: The name of the variable in environment to set
The value to set the named variable to
The sub-expression where name=value will be set in environment

type.description: Set multiple variables for sub-expressions

anyOf.description: The map of name -> variables to set
The sub-expression where name=value will be set in environment

type.description: Define a callable sub-expressions

anyOf.description: The map of name -> variables to set
A map of varName to the default value
The sub-expression where name=value will be set in environment

type.description: Call a defined function

anyOf.description: The map of name -> variables to set

type.description: Store a given key/value to long-term storage

anyOf.description: The store ID to use
The name of the variable in environment to store
The value to store

type.description: Retrieve a given stored key/value

anyOf.description: The store ID to use
The name of the variable in environment to retrieve
The sub-expression to execute to get a value if value is undefined

type.description: Delete a given stored value

anyOf.description: The store ID to use
The name of the variable in environment to delete

type.description: Enumerate current memories and stores
